Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person

  • public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Person - a character in a text-based game This class is part of the "Mansion Detective" application. "Mansion Detective" is a text based murder mystery adventure game. A "Person" represents any character (player or NPC) in the game. They have an inventory that stores item names and their object
    Version:
    2019.04.15
    Author:
    Claire Iroudayassamy

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String name,
              int maxWeight,
              Room startingRoom)
        Create a person. Initially they only have a name, their inventory capacity, and the room they start in.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person
        maxWeight - The max weight a person can carry.
        startingRoom - The room the person starts in.

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack()
        Try to attack an NPC. Fail miserably.

      • dropItem

        public void dropItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Drop item from inventory and add it to current room.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item to drop

      • eat

        public void eat()
        Eat some food to heal up.

      • examineItem

        public void examineItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Try to examine an item. If the item is not in the room, print an error message, otherwise print item details.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The item to examine

      • getCurrentRoom

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        Return the person's current room.

      • getInventoryMax

        public int getInventoryMax()
        Return inventory capacity.

      • getInventorySize

        public int getInventorySize()
        Return current inventory weight.

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Return item if it is in inventory. If the item is not in inventory return null, otherwise return the item.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item we want
        Returns:
        the item object we want to use

      • getItemKey

        public java.lang.String getItemKey()
        Return the name of the item that unlocks person hints.
        Returns:
        the name of the item

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Return the person's name.

      • getPreviousRoom

        public Room getPreviousRoom()
        Return the person's previous room. Returns null if the NPC hasn't moved.

      • giveItem

        public void giveItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                     Person person)
        Give an item to another person. If the receiver's inventory is full or the item is not in the giver's inventory print out error message.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item to give
        personName - The name of the person to give the item to

      • goBack

        public void goBack()
        Go back to the previous room.

      • goRoom

        public void goRoom(java.lang.String direction)
        Try to go in one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room, otherwise print an error message.
        Parameters:
        direction - The exit direction for the new room.

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Check if item is in inventory.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item to check for
        Returns:
        true if item is in inventory, else false.

      • isConscious

        public boolean isConscious()
        Get consciousness status.
        Returns:
        true if awake, false if passed out.

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        Return the person's dirty status.
        Returns:
        true if dirty, else false.

      • isMet

        public boolean isMet()
        Return if an NPC has been met
        Returns:
        true if met, else false

      • meet

        public void meet()
        Meet an NPC.

      • setItemKey

        public void setItemKey(java.lang.String itemName)
        Set the item name that unlocks person hints.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item key.

      • setRoom

        public void setRoom(Room room)
        Move NPC to new room.
        Parameters:
        room - The room to move the NPC to.

      • useItem

        public void useItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Remove a used item from inventory. Feed it to the void. (Item will no longer have any location reference)
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item to remove
